bibleStudyGuides.title: Genesis: Beginnings and Covenant
bibleStudyGuides.description: Explore the foundational book of the Bible covering creation, the patriarchs, and God's covenant promises. From the Garden of Eden to Joseph in Egypt, discover how God's plan for redemption begins.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Psalms: Songs of the Heart
bibleStudyGuides.description: Journey through Israel's worship book and discover prayers for every season of life. From lament to praise, learn how the Psalms teach us to bring our whole selves before God.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Isaiah: The Messianic Prophet
bibleStudyGuides.description: Study the most-quoted Old Testament prophet and his sweeping vision of judgment and restoration. Discover the Suffering Servant passages and their fulfillment in Christ.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Proverbs: Wisdom for Daily Living
bibleStudyGuides.description: Gain practical wisdom from Solomon and other sages for relationships, work, finances, and character. Learn how the fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Romans: The Gospel Explained
bibleStudyGuides.description: Paul's masterpiece of theology unpacked chapter by chapter. Understand justification, sanctification, and the relationship between law and grace in this systematic study.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Gospel of John: Believe and Live
bibleStudyGuides.description: Discover Jesus through the eyes of the beloved disciple. Study the seven signs, the I AM statements, and John's unique portrayal of Christ's deity and mission.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Acts: The Church Unleashed
bibleStudyGuides.description: Follow the explosive growth of the early church from Jerusalem to Rome. Study the work of the Holy Spirit through the apostles and learn lessons for the church today.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Revelation: Hope for the Future
bibleStudyGuides.description: Navigate the apocalyptic visions of John with clarity and confidence. Understand the major interpretive approaches and find hope in God's ultimate victory over evil.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Exodus: Deliverance and Law
bibleStudyGuides.description: Trace Israel's journey from slavery to Sinai. Study the plagues, the Passover, the giving of the Law, and the construction of the Tabernacle as pictures of Christ's redemptive work.

bibleStudyGuides.title: Ephesians: Life in Christ
bibleStudyGuides.description: Paul's letter on the riches of grace and the calling of the church. Study identity in Christ, spiritual warfare, and practical instructions for holy living in community.
